col_1.title: Welcome to Anwani
col_1.description: The APP that allows you to create a real address in less than a minute...

col_2.title: It's simple
col_2.description: Create an address or find one

col_1.title: Create Address
col_1.description: Create an address for your residence or (place of ) business.

col_2.title: View Existing Address
col_2.description: View your own address or an address that has been shared with you.

col_1.title: Share Address
col_1.description: Share your address with other users of Anwani.

col_2.title: Upload Location Image
col_2.description: Add a picture of your residence/place of business.

col_3.title: Address Receipt
col_3.description: Receive a digital receipt/proof of address ownership.

features.tertiary: * The Anwani business and government APPs are not available in the Google playstore. Please contact contact@coders4africa.com to get those APPs.

third.one: Perfect for individuals (personal use, plot/land allocation and records)
third.three: Perfect for government entities (polling,census, security, data collection
